articles.author: RAF CASERT, SYLVIE CORBET
articles.title: European leaders regroup in Paris for strategy huddle after Trump diplomatic blitz on Ukraine - The Associated Press
articles.description: French President Emmanuel Macron has called leaders from key European Union nations and the United Kingdom to his ornate Elysee Palace for an emergency meeting Monday. He wants to discuss how to deal with the Trump administration and step up plans to increase…
articles.content: PARIS (AP) French President Emmanuel Macron called leaders from key European Union nations and the United Kingdom to his ornate Elysee Palace on Monday for an emergency meeting on how to react to the… [+5092 chars]

articles.author: Alexandra Brzozowski
articles.title: Postcard from Munich: American carnage - EURACTIV
articles.description: European diplomats drank Munich dry of camomille tea as they sought respite from a harrowing weekend.
articles.content:
Munich, Germany By Sunday morning, the Bayerischer Hof was running low on camomile tea.
And that's about all one needs to know about the collective European psyche at the 61st edition of the Munich … [+3216 chars]
